event: Iraq invades Kuwait (Gulf War begins)
notes: Iraq's invasion of Kuwait triggers international sanctions and sets stage for Desert Storm.

event: Operation Desert Storm air campaign begins
notes: Coalition air strikes to expel Iraqi forces from Kuwait.

event: Asian Financial Crisis begins (Thai baht devaluation)
notes: Regional demand shock; contagion across East Asia.

event: Russian financial crisis and default
notes: Devaluation and default; global risk-off episode.

event: September 11 attacks (9/11)
notes: Terror attacks; global demand shock/flight to safety.

event: U.S.-led invasion of Iraq
notes: Major supply risk in a key producer.

event: Hurricane Katrina landfall; Gulf energy disruption
notes: Large shut-ins of GOM production and refining.

event: BP Prudhoe Bay partial shutdown (pipeline corrosion)
notes: Partial field shutdown due to severe corrosion.

event: Libyan Civil War unrest and supply disruption
notes: Output collapse; EIA estimated 60–90% drop in early March 2011.

event: OPEC opts not to cut production
notes: Decision accelerates 2014–2016 oil price slump.

event: U.S. lifts 40-year crude export ban
notes: Legislation authorizes crude exports without license.

event: JCPOA 'Implementation Day'—Iran oil sanctions lifted
notes: Nuclear-related sanctions lifted; Iranian exports recover.

event: OPEC agrees production cut (reintroduces target ~32.5 mb/d)
notes: OPEC cut ~1.2 mb/d; non-OPEC to add ~0.6 mb/d.

event: Saudi Abqaiq–Khurais oil facility attack
notes: Largest sudden supply outage in history; brief 5% of global supply offline.

event: Oil price crash amid COVID and OPEC+ breakdown
notes: Biggest one-day fall since 1991 Gulf War.

event: Record OPEC+ production cuts (~9.7 mb/d)
notes: Historic coordinated cuts to stabilize market.

event: EU embargo & G7 price cap on Russian seaborne crude take effect
notes: Embargo plus $60/bbl price cap framework.

event: OPEC+ surprise output cuts (~1.16 mb/d)
notes: Announced voluntary cuts by several members.

event: Israel–Hamas war begins
notes: Initial spike in Brent as risk premium rises.

event: Red Sea shipping disruptions escalate (Houthi attacks)
notes: Attacks force rerouting; freight and insurance costs surge.
